text: I work for the five school district I am
the manager of informational technology
and support services our integration of
workspaces in the five school district
has been something that we've been
looking at for quite a while with
especially staff stations you can stand
up a app stream or a workspace in less
than thirty minutes meaning we can
deploy an entire lab of
business-critical software in less than
30 minutes and it's accessible from any
device anywhere on our network anywhere
in the world so that that really fills a
void in providing equity in education
we're providing a device but we're also
now providing all the applications that
they would have in a lab this equates to
our students are now innovators 24 hours
a day with technology and really we're
not losing any learning opportunity cost
by providing all these business critical
applications to students on their
Chromebook devices we are looking at
moving away from labs and fully moving
towards out stream and workspaces
and what that's going to do is it's
going to allow our kids to have these
really expensive applications that they
don't normally have at home they now
have access to them at home our students
can now show their parents their work as
it progresses not just I'm taking this
class and here's my final product but
the students can now display their work
as they move through the project and the
parents and the teachers can see how the
students progressing how they're
thinking about what they're doing and
really see that vision come to fruition
you
